name: Too Tall To Fall
description:
IMPORTANT.Check the images for a detailed tutorial of the HUD, we ran out of time and it wasn't implemented on the game, highly experimental build( in other words we ran out of time). This game was made for "Tu Juego a Juicio Jam"

You have been selected by the government as the perfect manager to enhance the unit 3301 of building robots. Ensure your division succeed, otherwise...

Your organic matter will be recycled like the previous manager. That's not gonna be a problem, you will pay your monthly fee, right?

Then, lets begin!

Rule 1: Don't build too high

The government decided to let buildings be as long as you want, but an special height tax was added, so always remember "Don't build too high". The perfect height depends on the market demand.

Rule 2: Manage your resources

Remember, the robots you manage are limited, if you don't repair them, you're gona lose them forever.

And Rule 3: We never know what's planned for us, everything is coincidence, but even coincidence is part of fates design.

Always be prepared!
